title: I have heard that the Cape Fear Memorial Bridge was actually a used bridge purchased from New York. Is there any truth in that rumor?
text:
No, I haven't heard that rumor.



Here's a link to the answer that includes facts about the bridge and
its history.



http://www.myreporter.com/?p=7794



And here's a link to a Google archive story about the construction
of the bridge. It includes a photo of the bridge under construction:
http://news.google.com/newspapers?id=-klOAAAAIBAJ&sjid=EhQEAAAAIBAJ&pg=2302,2728780&dq=cape+fear+memorial+bridge+opens&hl=en
